font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. （带欺骗性地）修改，润色： to give an often deceptively attractive or improved appearance to
【例】 Any further retouch润饰 would be gilding the lily. 任何形式的润色都会是画蛇添足
【近】 polish, refine, smooth
【记】 gold
